mention.text: A partial solar eclipse visible across western North America
an employee at the California Institute of Technology in Pasadena
Clouds over downtown Salt Lake City
telescopes to watch the moon block 36 percent of the sun at 11:10 a.m. MST
an astronomer at the National Solar Observatory
conference co-organizer Mark Giampapa , an astronomer at the National Solar Observatory
